content.name: Code Play
content.description: Coding but with a twist. play a game inside a game. Join in on an interesting code-a-thon filled with ebb and flow
rules: Only one of the team members can code at a time.
Participants must choose a question randomly from the given 6 sets of questions of varying difficulty levels.
If a participantâ€™s code passes all the test cases, they will be able to move few steps forward, according to the difficulty level of the question on the code play board.
Participants must choose a question randomly from the 6 given difficulty levels set.
If a participant wants to swap a question, then they need to move few steps backward, according to the difficulty level of the question on the code play board.
The participant or team who reaches the last step in the board first will be considered the winner.
